title: My Friends list got deleted.

embed.description: Post with 0 views. Lol Friends gone???

body:
Ever since season 10 started my league client has had a bundle of problems with not loading anything on the home page but now it has gone and deleted all of my friends from my friends bar 1 person. and all of my friend's that I'm in a group with it says that I have never seen them before??? I have tried logging in and out of the client and checking for errors. Nothing, I got nothing. it says that I have never seen any of my friends or the people that I regularly play with and I want to know what the hell happened to my account and has anyone seen anything like this oh yeah my player IMG is gone aswell...

Send help

replies.body: Is that 1 friend someone you know??? I just logged in and my whole friend list is gone and has 1 random I've never met from NA server.

Could be your patching was interrupted at some point and is missing assets, or could be something conflicting. There were some recent issues like the one you've described but as far as I know they were all resolved (at least for the vast majority of players).

I would recommend submitting a ticket to player support: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to help you better in this scenario.

Do you know why the client is like this? There are quotation marks for my status which is unnecessary and I can't view offline profiles. Only people that were online and they got off.
The chat in champ select is not aligned correctly.
There should also be an S chest indicator or something to show how many s chest when you are at champ select because that will make life much easier.

The quotation marks for status have been there for ages. They are to distinguish between actual client status (In Game, Creating ..., Away, etc.) and written statuses.

Neither I nor my partner have any drama with chat alignment in select and I haven't heard any other mentions of the issue so I'm not exactly sure what/why you are experiencing that.

It really doesn't take much to look at the chest counter on your profile, and they have to limit the amount of extraneous information in champ select to keep the focus on the actual selection, so I doubt this is something they would consider implementing, but there are various places you could offer that feedback if it's a feature you feel important.

I don't believe you could ever view offline profiles directly from the friend list however you can always just search their profiles by Summoner Name.

Yes. That's true it has been for a while. I think it was added in the middle of last year. But compared to how long I have been playing, it's been here for a while. For me, it is just a useless feature that riot decided to waste their time and focus on. Riot focussed on something that they didn't need to because there are already features that help identifies if a person is ingame or not.

* The colours change based on the activity of the player.
Red = Away or afk
Green = Online
Blue = In queue or ingame
* Also hovering is very useful because it shows a lot of information.
Level of person
Character that is being played
Actual status: ingame (game mode, time, ranked or normal)
custom status
* Messaging a friend to ask if they're ingame by using league chat is also a feature btw.

Maybe its just my client idk.

True. But if I didn't know who I wanted to play and can't choose, ain't it a better idea to play someone random and also have a chance of earning a s chest.

I don't know about you but I used to be able to. Must be the recent league friends/chat problem. I know because I used to do this for a very long time. There's still a problem to this day. Also can't use the moblie league chat because of it. Sad thing is that I can't change my status on the mobile app :(
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
tbh I liked the old client cause it was less buggy and had fewer issues even though it doesn't look as nice as the current one. 

Also the cropping in the league loading ingame screen crops the icons a considerable amount.

We're getting pretty off-topic here. If you'd like to offer feedback about features of the client or other issues you may be experiencing with it, I would encourage you to make your own post as it will get more traction that way, and won't detract from OPs original concerns.

Help and Support posts don't appear on the front page of boards (as they are meant for question/answer type posts, not discussion) so posting feedback on this board is generally ill-advised.
